downloadTitle: Microsoft Office 365 Enterprise Volume License Activation Guide (Enterprise Agreement)
downloadDescription: The guides include step-by-step instruction to activate Office 365 licenses purchased through Enterprise Agreement.

downloadFile.name: EA-Online Services-Office 365 Volume Licensing Activation Guide.docx

detailsSection:
The guides include step-by-step instruction to activate Office 365 licenses purchased through Enterprise Agreement.
  • EA - Office365 Activation Guide.pdf: Includes step-by-step instruction to activate Office 365 licenses purchased through Enterprise Agreement.
  • EA-Online Services-Office 365 Volume Licensing Activation Guide.docx: This guide is intended to provide Microsoft Office 365 for Enterprises customers with a thorough understanding of the basic activation process when purchasing their online services using their Microsoft Volume Licensing Agreement.
detailsSection_file_name: EA-Online Services-Office 365 Volume Licensing Activation Guide.docx
systemRequirementsSection:
• The files are Microsoft Word documents. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
  • The PDF files require Adobe Reader to read.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Office 365 Guides for midsize businesses and enterprises
